monuments.name: Gateway of India
monuments.notes: Best visited in morning to avoid crowds. Free entry.

monuments.name: Elephanta Caves
monuments.notes: UNESCO World Heritage Site. Ferry ride approx 1 hour each way.

monuments.name: Haji Ali Dargah
monuments.notes: Famous mosque and tomb on an islet off Worli coast. Best visited during low tide.

monuments.name: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Terminus (CST)
monuments.notes: Historic railway station and UNESCO World Heritage Site. Stunning Gothic architecture.

monuments.name: Siddhivinayak Temple
monuments.notes: Famous Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Ganesha. Morning visit recommended.

monuments.name: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Vastu Sangrahalaya (Prince of Wales Museum)
monuments.notes: Art and history museum with rich collection of artifacts.

monuments.name: Bandra Fort
monuments.notes: Historic fort offering views of the sea and city skyline.

monuments.name: Red Fort
monuments.notes: UNESCO World Heritage Site. Best visited in morning.

monuments.name: Qutub Minar
monuments.notes: Tallest brick minaret in India.

monuments.name: India Gate
monuments.notes: War memorial. Best visited in evening for lights.

monuments.name: Humayun's Tomb
monuments.notes: UNESCO World Heritage Site. Mughal architecture.

monuments.name: Lotus Temple
monuments.notes: Bahá'í House of Worship. Free entry.

monuments.name: Taj Mahal
monuments.notes: Sunrise visit recommended for best photography.

monuments.name: Agra Fort
monuments.notes: UNESCO World Heritage Site.

monuments.name: Fatehpur Sikri
monuments.notes: Historic city and UNESCO site near Agra.

monuments.name: Amber Fort
monuments.notes: Elephant ride optional. Best morning visit.

monuments.name: Hawa Mahal
monuments.notes: Iconic palace of winds.

monuments.name: City Palace
monuments.notes: Royal residence with museums and courtyards.

monuments.name: Jal Mahal
monuments.notes: Palace in the middle of Man Sagar Lake, viewable from shore.

monuments.name: Victoria Memorial
monuments.notes: Marble monument and museum.

monuments.name: Indian Museum
monuments.notes: Largest museum in India.

monuments.name: Howrah Bridge
monuments.notes: Iconic cantilever bridge.

monuments.name: Fort St. George
monuments.notes: Historic fort and museum.

monuments.name: Kapaleeshwarar Temple
monuments.notes: Historic Hindu temple, free entry.

monuments.name: Santhome Cathedral Basilica
monuments.notes: Historic church built over tomb of St. Thomas.

monuments.name: Bangalore Palace
monuments.notes: Palace with Tudor-style architecture.

monuments.name: Tipu Sultan's Summer Palace
monuments.notes: Historic palace of Tipu Sultan.

monuments.name: Charminar
monuments.notes: Iconic mosque and landmark.

monuments.name: Golconda Fort
monuments.notes: Historic fort with sound & light show in evenings.

monuments.name: City Palace
monuments.notes: Royal palace with museums and courtyards.

monuments.name: Jag Mandir
monuments.notes: Island palace on Lake Pichola, boat ride optional.

monuments.name: Jagdish Temple
monuments.notes: Famous Hindu temple near City Palace.

monuments.name: Kashi Vishwanath Temple
monuments.notes: Spiritual Hindu temple. Free entry.

monuments.name: Dashashwamedh Ghat
monuments.notes: Historic ghat famous for Ganga Aarti in evenings.

monuments.name: Sarnath
monuments.notes: Buddhist pilgrimage site near Varanasi.
